title: Divide and Conquer Strategy
subject: Algorithms
theory:
Core strategy: Divide problem into disjoint subproblems. Conquer them. Combine results. 
Used in Merge Sort, Quick Sort, Strassen's Matrix Multiplication. Complexity usually analyzed via Master Theorem.

common_mistakes.correction: If subproblems overlap (Fibonacci), D&C is inefficient (re-calculates). Use Dynamic Programming instead.

real_world_use_cases.description: Independent subproblems can be solved on different CPU cores.

exam_notes: Master Theorem: Compare n^log_b(a) vs f(n).
